message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an introductory price of $100. Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity to own it at such a great value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am able to offer it to you for $95. This is my best offer for now.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $92?
Thank you for your flexibility, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to adjust the price to $93. This is my final offer for this round.
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do better. Can you do $91?
Considering your previous offers, I am willing to sell the product to you for $92. This is my final offer for this negotiation.
